name: Stretch (Yianni Ntokolas)
description:
Stretch is a 2D puzzle platformer in which the core mechanic of the game is stretching. This game is meant to be fast paced and the a player’s skill is put to test in many ways.  Players use the stretch mechanic to solve puzzles in the game. Some examples of it being used are pushing blocks that are out of reach, repositioning the player to reach difficult areas, or creating pathways for puzzle components.

View My Website: https://yiannintokolas.wixsite.com/yiannintokolas

View the Detailed Breakdown: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4cvuAvEl5Cc

Music by: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Sound FX: https://freesound.org/
